title: Nicola Sturgeon – 2021 Statement Following Death of HRH The Duke of Edinburgh
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Nicola Sturgeon, the Scottish First Minister, on 9 April 2021.
content:
On behalf of the people of Scotland, I would like to express my deepest sympathy to Her Majesty the Queen and the rest of the royal family.
